overview: (Fan edit of Exorcist 3)  A reworking of EXORCIST III in line with LEGION, the low key and more character-driven film that William Peter Blatty originally shot before studio-enforced reshoots and renaming. This edit restores the original cut's story arc, sans exorcist and exorcism, and includes a recreation of the original ending as described by Blatty.
title: Legion
